short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Email tracking with geolocation right in Gmail, with real time statistics.
short.es: Rastreo, tracking y geolocalización de sus emails, con estadísticas en tiempo real.
short.fr: Tracking, géolocalisation et planification de vos emails, avec statistiques en temps réel.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
THE ONLY GMAIL TRACKING WITH GEOLOCATION AND RECIPIENT'S MAP

GeoTrack lets you know who reads your emails, when, from where, and on which device they do so.
 
With GeoTrack you can:
 
- Instantly track all your read emails right in Gmail
- Track your recipient's geolocation
- Detect your recipient's device
- Get instant notification when a recipient opens your email or clicks on any links
- Get real-time email tracking statistics
- Get recipients' map and IPs
- Automatically forward all your tracked emails to your CRM


PRICING: FREE FOR LIFE!

GeoTrack is now FREE FOR LIFE for all users for basic usage, subscription plans available for advanced users.

--------------------------------------

long.es:
EMAIL TRACKING SIMPLIFIED
- Instantly track all your emails right in Gmail.
- Get notified when a recipient opens your email or clicks on your email links.
- See where, when, and on what device your email was opened.
- Schedule any email to be sent later

PRICING: FREE!
Geotrack is in Beta, kindly contact us at support@geotrack.email for any comment, suggestion or bug
long.fr:
TRACKING SIMPLIFIÉ DE VOS EMAILS

- Sachez instantanément si vos emails ont été lus ou ouverts
- Recevez une notification quand le destinataire a ouvert votre email ou cliqué sur un de vos liens
- Visualisez dans quel pays (et ville) votre email a été lu et sur quel appareil (téléphone, ordinateur, ...)
- Planifiez l'envoi de vos emails pour plus tard

PRIX: GRATUIT!

Geotrack est en Beta, merci de nous adresser une amil à support@geotrack.email pour tout commentaire, remarque ou suggestion
